channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why Optical Infrastructure Is Becoming Core To The Future Of AI
item.description: AI models are getting smarter, but most of their infrastructure is still stuck in the past. Silicon photonics could change that.

item.title: How AI And Mini-Organs Could Replace Testing Drugs On Animals
item.description: Congress and the FDA are pushing pharmaceutical companies to replace animals with technology for drug research. That’s a long way off, but startups an...

item.title: Do Not Reset Your Password — FBI Issues Critical New Warning
item.description: The FBI has updated its advice as Scattered Spider cyberattacks continue — do not reset your password.

item.title: How A 60-Year-Old Drug Developer Built A $4.4 Billion Biotech Treating ‘Butterfly Skin Disease’
item.description: Longtime drug developer Suma Krishnan was 51 when she cofounded Krystal Biotech. Now the company has one gene therapy on the market and more in the wo...

item.title: CVS Profits Eclipse $1 Billion As Aetna’s Costs Begin To Stabilize
